QueryResult.text: (SELECT t.prResourceID RESOURCE_ID, t.prProjectID PROJECT_ID, t.prID TEAM_ID, c.start_date QUARTER_START_DATE, 0 ALLOC_PERCENT, 0 ALLOC_FTE, 0 HARD_ALLOC_PERCENT, 0 HARD_ALLOC_FTE FROM prTeam t, srm_resources r, rpt_calendar c WHERE t.prResourceID = r.id AND r.resource_type <= 1 AND c.period_type = 'QUARTERLY' UNION SELECT t.prResourceID RESOURCE_ID, t.prProjectID PROJECT_ID, t.prID TEAM_ID, al_s.slice_date MONTH_START_DATE, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL (c.fte, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END) / c.fte) * 100 END, 0)) ALLOC_PERCENT, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL (c.fte, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END) / c.fte) END, 2)) ALLOC_FTE, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL (c.fte, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END) / c.fte) * 100 END, 0)) HARD_ALLOC_PERCENT, MAX(ROUND(CASE WHEN NVL (c.fte, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((CASE WHEN al_sr.request_name = 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC' THEN al_s.slice ELSE 0 END) / c.fte) END, 2)) HARD_ALLOC_FTE FROM prteam t INNER JOIN srm_resources r ON t.prResourceID = r.id INNER JOIN prj_blb_slices al_s ON t.prID = al_s.prj_object_ID INNER JOIN prj_blb_slicerequests al_sr ON al_s.slice_request_id = al_sr.id INNER JOIN rpt_calendar c ON al_s.slice_date = c.start_date WHERE (r.resource_type <= 1) AND c.period_type = 'QUARTERLY' AND (al_sr.request_name IN ('QUARTERLYRESOURCEALLOCCURVE', 'QUARTERLYRESOURCEHARDALLOC')) GROUP BY t.prResourceID, t.prProjectID, t.prID, al_s.slice_date)
